prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with sleek wings and a shiny body.
Imagine a fast-flying Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats.
Generate a Pokemon that has a mix of yellow and black colors.
Show me a Pokemon with distinct red accents and insect-like features.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its speed and agile movements.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a larva into a stunning creature.
Make a Pokemon that can camouflage in grasslands and forests.
